sentences.english: The archival jobholders appears to be tired.
sentences.chinese: 檔案從業人員出現職業倦怠。

sentences.english: This heat wave has everyone dragging around.
sentences.chinese: 這陣熱浪已使每個人感到倦怠。

sentences.english: The March wind is fretful, fretting the languid wave into murmurs .
sentences.chinese: 三月的風躁動不安，惹得倦怠的波浪嘩嘩作響。

sentences.english: He felt himself breaking into a languorous smile, and she beamed at him.
sentences.chinese: 他感覺到自己流露出一個倦怠的微笑，她注視着他。

sentences.english: We already agreed to face the world in languor, absentmindedly.
sentences.chinese: 我們已經同意在倦怠面對世界，一邊心不在焉。

sentences.english: You'rebound to get bored or burned-out if you keep running the same roadsweek after week.
sentences.chinese: 你一定會感到無聊或者倦怠如果你一直跑同樣的路線。

sentences.english: The languorous phenomenon of occupation walks into people's life gradually.
sentences.chinese: 職業倦怠現象漸漸走進人們的生活。

sentences.english: Waves spread a layer, the wrist on the ground looked on his forehead as burnout.
sentences.chinese: 波瀾一層層蔓延開來，腕就那樣倦怠地枕着額頭。

sentences.english: We gave shade on languorous summer days.
sentences.chinese: 在令人倦怠的夏日，我們供大家遮蔭。

sentences.english: Lord Henry turned and looked at the duchess with his slumberous eyes .
sentences.chinese: 亨利勳爵轉過頭來，用倦怠的眼睛望着公爵夫人。

sentences.english: Yellow clay improves the condition of devitalised and tired looking skin.
sentences.chinese: 黃泥用於改善失去活力的倦怠的皮膚。

sentences.english: You're bound to get bored or burned-out if you keep running the same roads week after week.
sentences.chinese: 如果一直跑同樣的路線，不感到無聊或者倦怠纔怪。

sentences.english: The teachers job burnout restricts the development of education and the entire society.
sentences.chinese: 教師職業倦怠制約教育事業和整個社會的發展。

sentences.english: The March wind is fretful, fretting the languid waves into murmurs.
sentences.chinese: 三月風躁動不安，把倦怠的波浪攪得滿腹怨言。

sentences.english: The prospect of wrestling with Meereen once more left her feeling weary.
sentences.chinese: 與彌林人的角逐的展望又一次讓她感到倦怠。

sentences.english: The author made a study of the strategy to fight against burnout on the basis of this research.
sentences.chinese: 在此基礎上，作者研究了高中生學習倦怠感的對策。

definition: dispirited and downcast (idiom); listless/in low spirits/washed out
